name: Logicrays Easy Coming soon page
author: Logicrays

sections.description:
Logicrays Easy Coming soon is the perfect WordPress plugin to Add a maintenance or coming soon page easily to your website/blog that lets visitors know your website is under maintenance.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload Zip file lecsp-coming-soon to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Zip file lecsp-coming-soon to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
